title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The bug report is about a dynamic text element that is not displaying the expected content type correctly. The database field has three types of content: 1) HTML text within <html> tags, 2) HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and 3) Text with RTF tags. The dynamic text element is used to display the contents of this field.
OB: The dynamic text element is not displaying the correct content type for the database field. It is not rendering HTML tags correctly and is not preserving RTF tags when displaying the text.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Create a database field with HTML text within <html> tags, HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and text with RTF tags.2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.3. Verify that the dynamic text element does not render HTML tags correctly and does not preserve RTF tags in the displayed text.
